You preach with such zeal and theological accuracy that you win the approval of the Soulwatch. They decide to initiate you into the Church of Ebron immediately (you cannot refuse!).
Delete whatever god you had in your God box on your Adventure Sheet (if any) and replace it with Ebron.
[Also, lose the title Chosen One of Nagil if you had it].
If you already had Ebron in your God box, you are presented with a .
Lose the codewords Erebus and Evade if you had them.
